entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse The thing that will have to be studied someday is why Trumpers thought they were immune from contagion & how they were so easily deceived into believing that every expert in the world - & every other nation - is lying about Covid-19 b/c one man says so. https://t.co/suPFLMXBev
